item.description:
Support and Discussion group for people who are HSP. HSP is personality type described by Elaine Aron Ph.D. in her book 'The Highly Sensitive Person'. Discuss how her writings relate to us and our personal life.

Take the Test in the Messages Section and see if you are HSP.

These books also are good:
The Highly Sensitive Person at Work
The Highly Sensitive Person in Love
The Highly Sesitive Child
The Highly Sensitive Person Workbook

group.name: The first time book writers club for non-professionals

item.name: The Framingham Elaine Aron and Highly Sensitive Persons Meet Meetup
